text: The 1994 United States Soccer Federation presidential election was held on August 13, 1994 to determine the next President of the United States Soccer Federation. Alan I. Rothenberg was re-elected by defending Richard Groff & Hank Des Bordes on the second ballot. ==First Ballot== *Alan I. Rothenberg - 48.9% *Richard Groff - 46.9% *Hank Des Bordes - 4.2% ==Second Ballot== *Alan I. Rothenberg - 53.6% *Richard Groff - 46.4% Hank Des Bordes withdrew ==References== Category:Presidents of the United States Soccer Federation Category:1994 in American soccer
title: 1994 United States Soccer Federation presidential election
